sentences.sContent: A lot of the older houses have now been rehabilitated.
sentences.sCn: 很多老房子现在都进行了修葺。

synos.tran: 使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状
复兴；复权；恢复正常生活

remMethod.val: re(再， 又) + hab(拥有) + ilit + ate → 重新拥有 → 使恢复原状， 修复

trans.tranOther: to improve a building or area so that it returns to the good condition it was in before
